headline: Xerox Launches Unified Cybersecurity Solution for SMBs Powered by Palo Alto Networks and Cyber Insurance from The Hartford
summary: NORWALK, Conn., November 19, 2025--Xerox today announced the launch of XeroxTM TriShield 360 Cyber Solution, a holistic cybersecurity offering built on Palo Alto Networks Cortex ® XDR ® to deliver enterprise-grade protection, while enabling cyber risk management for small- and medium-sized businesses. This offering combines advanced detection technology, continuous monitoring and response, and financial protection through partnerships with Lumifi® and its Security Operations Center, and cyber in
